data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 121,054 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sud-Ouest, Cameroon
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Sud-Ouest that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Sud-Ouest a passion to plant another simple church.
Lord, make the 121,054 believers in Sud-Ouest to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,195,047 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Sud-Ouest, Cameroon to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,316,100 people living in Sud-Ouest, Cameroon. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Sud-Ouest
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Sud-Ouest
location.people_groups_list: Njen, Nzin, Barombi, Bonkeng, Bassar, Ntcham
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Njen, Nzin (3,100), Barombi (5,200), Bonkeng (5,400), Bassar, Ntcham (2,800)
